original_title: 生意気な女上司も二人きりになると簡単に堕ちる(笑) 僕だけのフェラチオペットにしてやった。
overview: Consistently top sales performance in 3rd year of employment. My direct female boss is a super elite who is respected in the company. But she has a cute face, but she has a tough personality. No one can say anything because she can do her job more than anyone else...I'm getting more and more excited. A business trip with such a female boss was decided. Anyway, under this female boss, this job won't last long... It's a good opportunity, let's give it a shot and quit... (laughs).
title: Even the impudent female bosses easily fall when alone with me (lol) I made her my own Fellatio pet – Misaki nanami
